question.summary: Find pathways by association to genes.
question.description: Find pathways by association to genes.

columnAttribute.name: gene_count
columnAttribute.help: Number of genes from the input list associated with this pathway. Add a column to see a list of these genes

columnAttribute.name: genes
columnAttribute.help: Genes from the input list associated with this pathway, separated by '|'

columnAttribute.name: ec_gene
columnAttribute.help: For each gene associated with a pathway, the EC number(s) assigned to that gene. EC numbers are separated by '|' and appear in the same order as the genes in the 'Genes' column. Where a gene is annotated with more than one EC number, these are separated by a comma

columnAttribute.name: ec_pathway
columnAttribute.help: For each gene associated with a pathways, the EC number(s) in the pathway that are matched by the gene based on the gene's EC annotation. EC numbers are separated by '|' and appear in the same order as the genes in the 'Genes' column. Wehre a gene matches more than one EC number in a pathway, theses are separated by a comma
